ListDynamicDisposalProcesses.summary: Batch Query Dynamic Policy Disposal Processes

schema.description: The page number to display in the paginated query. Range: 1~10000.
The number of items per page in the paginated query. Range: 1~1000.
The start time for querying dynamic disposal processes. Format: Unix timestamp (in seconds).
The end time for querying dynamic disposal processes. Format: Unix timestamp (in seconds).
Username.

Disposal action.
- **ztna_connect**: Prohibit connection to the zero-trust intranet.
- **nac_connect**: Prohibit connection to the office network access.
- **none**: No disposal action.

Recovery type.
- **auto**: Automatic recovery.
- **console**: Console recovery.
- **auth**: Recovery by authentication and reporting.

Disposal status. Values:
- **disposal**: In the disposal state.
- **finished**: Already automatically recovered.
- **recovery**: Recovered by authentication and reporting or console recovery.
Disposal process ID.
Terminal device ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Response body.

items.description: Disposal process.

Status.description:
Disposal status. Values:
- **disposal**: In the disposal state.
- **finished**: Already automatically recovered.
- **recovery**: Recovered by authentication and reporting or console recovery.

Hostname.description: Terminal device name. Length: 1~128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase/lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, half-width periods (.), commas (,), semicolons (;), hyphens (-), underscores (_), slashes (/), at (@) symbols, and spaces. Entering an underscore (_) alone will additionally query all terminal devices with 4-byte UTF-8 characters in their names.

items.description:
Disposal action.
- **ztna_connect**：Prohibit connecting to the zero-trust intranet.
- **nac_connect**：Prohibit connecting to the office network access.

RecoveryType.description:
Recovery type.
- **auto**：Automatic recovery.
- **console**：Console recovery.
- **auth**：Certification and reporting recovery.

DisposalTime.description: Disposal time, in seconds since the epoch.

DevType.description:
Device operating system type. Values:
- **Windows**：Windows system.
- **macOS**：macOS system.
- **Linux**：Linux system.
- **Android**：Android system.
- **iOS**：iOS system.
- **Windows_Wuying**：Wuying cloud desktop system.

SaseUserId.description: Unique ID of the SASE user.

Department.description: Department to which the user belongs.

DlpStatus.description:
Office data protection status. Values:
- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.
- **Unprovisioned**: Not configured.
- **Unauthorized**: Unauthorized.

NacStatus.description:
Network access control status. Values:
- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.
- **Unprovisioned**: Not configured.

TotalNum.description: Total number of dynamic disposal processes.

GetPrivateAccessPolicy.title: Query Intranet Access Policy Details

schema.description: Name of the private access policy. The length is 1 to 128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase and lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-).

Description of the private access policy. The length is 1 to 128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase and lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), hyphens (-), and spaces.

Action of the private access policy. Values:
- **Block**: Block.
- **Allow**: Allow.

Application type of the private access policy. Values:
- **Application**: Application.
- **Tag**: Tag.
Set of application IDs for the private access policy. Up to 100 application IDs can be entered. Required when **ApplicationType** is **Application**. Mutually exclusive with **TagIds**.

items.description:
Application ID for the private access policy. Value sources:
- [ListPrivateAccessApplications](~~ListPrivateAccessApplications~~): Batch query private access applications.
- [CreatePrivateAccessApplication](~~CreatePrivateAccessApplication~~): Create a private access application.

schema.description: Set of tag IDs for the private access policy. Up to 100 tag IDs can be entered. Required when **ApplicationType** is **Tag**. Mutually exclusive with **ApplicationIds**.

items.description:
Tag ID for the private access policy. Value sources:
- [ListPrivateAccessTags](~~ListPrivateAccessTags~~): Batch query private access tags.
- [CreatePrivateAccessTag](~~CreatePrivateAccessTag~~): Create a private access tag.

schema.description:
User group type of the private access policy. Values:
- **Normal**: Normal user group.
- **Custom**: Custom user group.
Set of user group IDs for the private access policy. Required when the user group type is **Normal**. Mutually exclusive with the custom user group set. Up to 2000 user group IDs can be entered.

items.description:
User group ID for the private access policy when the user group type is **Normal**. Value sources:
- [ListUserGroups](~~ListUserGroups~~): Batch query user groups.
- [CreateUserGroup](~~CreateUserGroup~~): Create a user group.

schema.description: Set of custom user groups for the private access policy. Required when the user group type is **Custom**. Mutually exclusive with the user group ID set. Up to 10 custom user groups can be entered.

items.description: Custom user group for the private access policy.

UserGroupType.description:
Type of the custom user group. Values:
- **username**: Username.
- **department**: Department.
- **email**: Email.
- **telephone**: Telephone.

Relation.description:
Relation of the custom user group. Values:
- **Equal**: Equal.
- **Unequal**: Not equal.

Value.description:
Value of the custom user group attribute.
- When the user group type is **username**, it represents the value of the username. The length is 1 to 128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase and lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), hyphens (-), asterisks (*), at (@) symbols, and spaces.
- When the user group type is **department**, it represents the value of the department. For example: OU=Department1,OU=SASE DingTalk.
- When the user group type is **email**, it represents the value of the email. For example: username@example.com.
- When the user group type is **telephone**, it represents the value of the telephone. For example: 13900001234.

IdpId.description: The ID of the identity source for the custom user group. Required when the custom user group type is **department**.

schema.description:

- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.

schema.description:
The watermark type. Valid values:

*   **PureWebappInvisible**: web page watermark
*   **PureAppInvisible**: app watermark
*   **PureScreenInvisible**: screen watermark
*   **PureDocument**: document watermark
*   **PureImage**: image watermark
*   **PureAudio**: audio watermark
*   **PureVideo**: video watermark
*   **AigcWebappInvisible**: artificial intelligence generated content (AIGC)-based webpage watermark
*   **AigcAppInvisible**: AIGC-based app watermark
*   **AigcScreenInvisible**: AIGC-based screen watermark
*   **AigcDocument**: AIGC-based document watermark
*   **AigcImage**: AIGC-based image watermark
*   **AigcAudio**: AIGC-based audio watermark
*   **AigcVideo**: AIGC-based video watermark

schema.title:
可用于下载文件的 URL
控制台调用时传递文件的 oss 路径
schema.description: The URL used to download the file to be extracted. The URL must be accessible over the Internet.

schema.title: 文件名，后端需要根据文件名的后缀判断校验文件类型
schema.description: The name of the file to be extracted. The system needs to check the file type based on the file name extension.

schema.title: 水印信息的容量位宽，可用值为 32, 40, 64，不传时默认为32。非32时需显式指定。比如嵌入式使用的是 40 位的sdk，那么提取时也需要将该值设为 40。
schema.description: The watermark information size. Default value: 32. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. For example, if a 40-bit watermark is used for watermark embedding, you must set this parameter to 40 for watermark extraction.

schema.title: 长视频水印参数：含义为视频倍速，浮点数字符串。默认1，代表添加水印时的采用倍速，或者添加水印之后，视频时间轴拉伸的倍速
schema.description: The watermark parameter for long videos that specifies the video speed factor. The value can be a floating-point number or a string. Default value: 1. This parameter indicates the speed at which a watermark is added or the time-stretching rate for videos after a watermark is added.

schema.title: 视频水印参数：在嵌入视频水印时，通过该值控制使用使用长视频的SDK。默认为 false，此时会使用短视频的 SDK
schema.description:
The watermark parameter for videos that specifies whether to use the long video watermark SDK. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

schema.title: 文档水印参数：当提取文档截图中的背景暗水印信息时将该参数设为true。默认为 false
schema.description:
The document watermark parameter that specifies whether the file to be extracted is a screenshot of a document with a background watermark added. The system determines whether to use the extraction logic for document background watermarks based on whether the file to be extracted is an image file. By default, you do not need to configure this parameter. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
The CSV watermark control parameter. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

Method.description: The CSV watermark embedding method. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

EmbedColumn.description: The lossy embedding control parameter that specifies columns to be modified You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

EmbedPrecision.description: The lossy embedding control parameter that specifies the modification precision. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

EmbedTimePosition.title: 嵌入位置，枚举值。需要和嵌入时的参数保持一致
EmbedTimePosition.description: The timestamp watermark parameter that specifies the embedding position of the timestamp watermarks. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

EmbedBitsNumberInEachTime.title: 时间戳信息位宽，需要和嵌入时保持一致。
EmbedBitsNumberInEachTime.description: The timestamp watermark parameter that specifies how much information a single timestamp holds. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

TimeFormat.title: 时间戳的格式，需要和嵌入时保持一致。
TimeFormat.description: The timestamp watermark parameter that specifies the timestamp format. You must keep the value of this parameter consistent for watermark embedding and watermark extraction. Otherwise, the extraction fails.

Data.description: The information about the watermark extraction task.

TaskId.title: task id, 用于查询任务结果
TaskId.description: The task ID. You can use task IDs to query task results.

schema.title:
水印类型
PureDocument: 常规文档水印
PureImage: 常规图片水印
PureAudio: 常规音频水印
PureVideo: 常规视频水印
AigcDocument: AIGC文档水印
AigcImage: AIGC图片水印
AigcAudio: AIGC音频水印
AigcVideo: AIGC视频水印
文件名，后端需要根据文件名的后缀判断校验文件类型

可用于下载文件的 URL
控制台调用时传递文件的 oss 路径
水印信息的容量位宽，可用值为 32, 40, 64，不传时默认为32。非32时需显式指定。比如嵌入式使用的是 40 位的sdk，那么提取时也需要将该值设为 40。
base64 编码后的字符串格式水印信息 。若设置该值，则 wmInfoUint 不能设置。
视频水印参数：默认为 false，此时会使用短视频的 SDK，设为true时会使用使用长视频的SDK
短视频水印参数，含义为视频的比特率(bitrate)，短视频时必须设置该参数。
图像水印参数：取值范围为 [0, 4]，默认值为 2。更大的值意味着更高的鲁棒性，但是视觉质量会下降。
图像水印参数：期望的输出图像jpeg压缩质量因子，取值范围 [1, 100]，默认值 95

EmbedTimePosition.title: 时间戳水印参数。水印嵌入位置。可以为Min（分）、Sec（秒）、MilSec（毫秒），三者选一个填入，选择哪个，则算法修改哪个位置的数据。

TimeFormat.title: 时间戳水印参数。解析csv文件中时间戳的格式字符串。若csv文件中的时间戳类似“2023-10-15 13:20:59:342”，则对应的格式字符串为“Year-Mon-Day Hour:Min:Sec.MilSec”，则这里要填“Year-Mon-Day Hour:Min:Sec.MilSec”，水印嵌入后依然按照此格式输出，一旦填错则该方法无法使用。格式字符串中的年、月、日、时、分、秒、毫秒必须按照上述写法填写，连接符为英文非字符的单连接符，一般可以是“:”“/”“-”“ ”（空格），额外支持“T”“Z”为连接符。其他形式的时间格式目前不支持解析。

EmbedBitsNumberInEachTime.title: 时间戳水印信息位宽。指定单个时间戳容纳多少信息，这个数越大，提取信息需要的行数理论上越少，但是修改的时间幅度变大，幅度范围是2的n次方，n为此参数值。

EmbedDensity.title: 零宽字符水印参数。嵌入密度，取值在0～1之间的浮点数，0为仅嵌入第一行内容，1为所有行均嵌入。
